meta.name: description
meta.content: The official website for the White County Government located in Cleveland, Georgia.

li.a: 2019 Board of Commissioner Minutes and Agendas
Hotel / Motel Monthly Application and Report
Recently Sold a Home or Property?

hr.p: Changes to section 1501 are written in red. Please see the document below for the new section 1501.
hr.h3: Short Term Rental Suspension by Order of the Governor
hr.p: On Wednesday April 8th 2020, Governor Brian Kemp passed an executive order to suspend short term rentals. The order can be found below.

div.div: Emergency declaration placing restrictions on short term rentals by the Governor, Brian Kemp.

hr.p: The Board of Commissioners entered into an emergency meeting on 3/26/20. The board passed Resolution 2020-3 to declare a state of emergency and stop the spread of COVID-19. The resolution can be found below.

div.div: Resolution declaring a state of emergency in White County and protective ordinance to control the spread of COVID-19.

hr.p: While the risk of Coronavirus or COVID-19 infection is relatively low, Georgia Officials are working hard to prevent the spread within the state. Learn how you can help prevent infectious viruses such as COVID-19 from spreading by reading the guide below.

Every one counts. Help us complete the 2020 census and secure the proper information necessary to affect change in Georgia. Visit the State of Georgia's Census page to learn more about this historic survey.

Pursuant to O.C.G.A. §50-14-1(a)(1), the White County Board of Commissioners, at a Called Meeting held March 12, 2020, have determined that Jason Lee Cobb is under consideration as the sole finalist for the position of White County Manager.

p.span: The White County Board of Commissioners will make its final decision to fill the position related to the candidate listed above at a Called Meeting on Monday, March 30, 2020 at 4:30 p.m. If you have questions, please contact Shanda Murphy, County Clerk, at (706) 865- 2235.

hr.p: The following document outlines steps to bring short term and vacation rentals into compliance with White County.

Revised Land Use Regulations Effective 06/04/2019 - Including Short Term Rentals

Effective Jan. 1, 2018, White County will be charging fees for any changes in land use including zoning changes, variances, conditional use and special use permits. Fees will be in accordance with the following chart and will be due at application.
Official Land Use Map for White County Georgia - Adopted 2018 -Updated June 4, 2019
